articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Terms U.S. Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Terms U.S. Human Rights Abuser 
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA on Tuesday as regards the serious racial discrimination in the U.S. sparking off world public uproar:
					 Some days ago, a black teenager was shot to death by a white policeman in Ferguson City, Missouri State, the U.S. and police ruthlessly cracked down on protesters, leveling their rifles at them and firing tear gas and smoke shells. Against this backdrop, there occurred a shuddering incident in another city in which a policeman shot another young black man to death.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, a country wantonly violating the human rights where people are subject to discrimination and humiliation due to their races and they are seized with such horror that they do not know when they are shot to death.
					
					 The protests in Ferguson City and other parts of the U.S. are an eruption of the pent-up discontent and resistance of the people against racial discrimination and inequality deeply rooted in the American society.
					
					 The recent cases brought to light the human rights performance in the U.S. and underscored the urgent need to force the U.S. to sit in the dock of a human rights court.
					
					 The U.S. issued every year a report taking issue with "human rights performances" of other countries as if it were an "international human rights judge" but this time suffered disgrace and became a laughing stock of the world owing to what happened in it.
					
					 The U.S. had better honestly accept the unanimous accusations of the broad international community and mind its own business, instead of interfering in the internal affairs of other countries.
					
					 It should not seek solutions to its problem in suppressing demonstrators but bring to light the real picture of the American society, a graveyard of human rights, and have a correct understanding of what the genuine human rights are like  and how they should be guaranteed.
					
					 The U.S. should know that it is bound to get itself into a big trouble unless it behaves with discretion, not knowing where it stands.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Chief Culprit of Counterfeit Notes Printing and Circulation
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Chief Culprit of Counterfeit Notes Printing and Circulation
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Various U.S. papers on August 14 reported about the disclosure of the biggest-ever counterfeit note case.
					 According to them, the U.S. investigation authorities in May this year arrested ten Americans and three Israelis who had printed 100 US dollar notes and circulated them since the 1990s. The bogus notes printed by them reportedly amounted to 77 million U.S. dollars.
					
					 The papers also disclosed that forged notes to the tune of 156 million US dollars were confiscated, 262 illegal mints discovered and 2 668 criminals arrested.
					
					 As seen above, the U.S. is the center for printing counterfeit notes and a prime mover of their circulation.
					
					 It is worth noting that CIA and other government institutions of the U.S. have taken the lead in perpetrating such crimes.
					
					 Some years ago, the German paper Frankfurlter Allgemeine disclosed that CIA had forged notes at a secret print shop in the suburbs of Washington by using the research findings made by experts on counterfeit notes in Europe and Asia and on the basis of the testimonies made by those related to printer manufacturing business. An author of a book about note-fakers and the secret lurking behind bank note printing claimed that such bogus dollar notes are illegally printed at the same time when genuine ones are printed and the forging of such top-class counterfeit notes can be done only by such U.S. government organ as CIA.
					
					 The world community is unanimous in recognizing that the U.S. administration has forged notes for spending a lot of money for secret operations to stamp out freedom and democracy.
					
					 The U.S. administration is the A-class criminal printing counterfeit notes and circulating them. It is, indeed, the most hideous criminal state.
					
					 However, the U.S. is accusing the DPRK of "printing counterfeit notes", a height of impudence.
					
					 In a bid to make its false "story about north's counterfeit notes" sound plausible, the U.S. has floated such false rumors that north Korea has forged US dollar notes by importing equipment and paper from a certain country and ink from a certain country. It even claimed that the above-said story was testified by "defectors from the north" and the "super notes" faked by north Korea are so sophisticated that only ultra-modern note discriminating machine can identify them and criminals and equipment should be handed over to the U.S.
					
					 However, the U.S. has failed to produce evidence proving its assertions. On the contrary, the U.S. public is becoming increasingly vocal expressing suspicions and objections.
					
					 Bolton, former U.S. ambassador to the United Nations, and some other hawks in the U.S. confessed that they had no convincing evidence proving "north Korea's forging of notes".
					
					 Even U.S. papers disclosed that the figure 100 on a "north Korea-made super note" was written by special ink which is being supplied only to the Bureau of the Mint under strict control and, moreover, the "witnesses" are all incredible "defectors from the north" and swindlers who had never seen the process of making "bogus US dollars" but only seek to get money by making false testimonies.
					
					 The U.S. investigation authorities formed a group and conducted investigation for almost a year but what it found at last was the fact that "the story about north Korea's counterfeit notes" was incredible.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the "story about the DPRK's involvement in forging notes" is nothing but a conspiratorial charade.
					
					 The disgusting true colors of tricksters who slander others, not knowing where they stand, are bound to be revealed any time.
					
					 Counterfeit notes printing, drug trafficking and other crimes are chronic ills of the U.S. The world public is ridiculing the U.S. for frequently orchestrating such charades in a bid to carry out its hegemonic scenario.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Cuban Foreign Ministry Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Cuban Foreign Ministry Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Cuban Ministry of Foreign Affairs headed by Director General for  Bilateral Affairs Gerardo Penalver Portal who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Delegation of Cuban Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Delegation of Cuban Foreign Ministry
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong met and had a talk with the delegation of the Cuban Ministry of Foreign Affairs headed by Director General for Bilateral Affairs Gerardo Penalver Portal who paid a courtesy call on him Tuesday.

articles.title: Italian Delegation of Lawmakers Arrives
articles.content:
Italian Delegation of Lawmakers Arrives
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of lawmakers from various political parties of Italy led by Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate who is chairman of the Italia-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group, arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Kang Sok Ju Meets Italian Delegation of Lawmakers
articles.content:
Kang Sok Ju Meets Italian Delegation of Lawmakers
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Kang Sok Ju, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Tuesday met and had a talk with the delegation of lawmakers from various political parties of Italy led by Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate who is chairman of the Italia-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group.

articles.title: Italian Delegation of Lawmakers Feted
articles.content:
Italian Delegation of Lawmakers Feted
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea gave a reception in honor of the visiting delegation of lawmakers from various political parties of Italy at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel Tuesday.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the delegation led by Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate who is chairman of the Italia-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group.
					
					 Kang Sok Ju, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Yong Chol, vice department director, and officials of the C.C., the WPK were present there.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Vow to Glorify Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Leadership Feats
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Vow to Glorify Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Leadership Feats
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army held a meeting at the Ssangunri Revolutionary Site on Monday. They vowed to glorify forever the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of leader Kim Jong Il and remain loyal to the leadership of respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					 Present there were commanding officers of the KPA, service personnel of the Ground, Naval and Air and Anti-Air Force of the KPA.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, there took place a ceremony and military music concert of the military bands of KPA units.
					
					 KPA General Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The Day of Songun, the revolutionary holiday which can be called by linking with the august name of Kim Jong Il only is the day of history together with the day of army-building which will remain shining in the history of the building of the Korean revolutionary armed forces and the history of the country, the reporter said.
					
					 Kim Jong Il started the Songun leadership by inspecting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, Juche 49 (1960) and, thereby, the precious history and traditions of the Korean revolution which was hewed out and triumphantly advanced with arms have been given a steady continuity and the new era of the Juche revolution making a long drive under the unfurled banner of Songun opened, he noted.
					
					 He advanced the idea of attaching importance to the military affairs and directed primary efforts to bolstering up the military muscle from the first period of his Songun revolutionary leadership, strengthened the political and military power of the People's Army and thus shattered the provocation moves of the enemies and firmly defended Korean-style socialism, he said.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il could smash the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the imperialists and lead the revolution and construction to victory, a historic miracle which can be wrought by him only.
					
					 The revolutionary feats of Kim Jong Il who put the dignity and position of the country on the highest level of the world under the unfurled banner of Songun for more than five decades since he started the Songun revolutionary leadership in Ssangun-ri will go down forever along with the prosperity of the powerful Paektusan nation, he stressed.
					
					 The Juche-based revolutionary cause of Songun which has won for decades under his care is dynamically advancing under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, he said.
					
					 A new heyday for the strengthening of the revolutionary armed forces and the prosperity of the country has been ushered in thanks to Kim Jong Un who is arousing all service personnel and people to building a thriving nation while ceaselessly visiting the KPA units and forefront outposts associated with the feats Kim Jong Il performed in commanding the army, he noted.
					
					 He called for glorifying for all ages the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and fighting for the final victory for national reunification and the building of a thriving nation, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then followed speeches of KPA general officer Kim Song Chol, officers Choe Chol Ju, Pak Kwang Chol and Sonu Yong Saeng.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, service personnel presented a dancing party to the tune of revolutionary army songs. They visited the Ssangunri Revolutionary Site and held a meeting for explaining the greatness of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Will Have to Pay High Price for Staging UFG: Warns Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Will Have to Pay High Price for Staging UFG: Warns Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. announced that it would apply for the first time during Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises being staged in south Korea the "strategy" which calls for making a preemptive strike by mobilizing all forms of armed forces including nuclear weapons if "signs of the use of nukes and missiles" by someone are detected.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday terms it an undisguised and challenging nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK.
					
					 Some days ago, U.S. politicians blustered that they would carry on joint military exercises, claiming in the international arena that the justifiable self-defensive steps taken by the DPRK are "disturbing stability in the whole region", "sparking off serious concern" and "posing a threat".
					
					 The U.S. repetition of its criminal scenario to disturb peace and ignite a nuclear war through a vicious cycle of tensions on the Korean peninsula and in the region every year would only increase its danger.
					
					 The joint military exercises now under way under the pretext of "threat" from the DPRK are strictly pursuant to the U.S. strategy for world domination, the strategy to control the Asian continent with the Korean peninsula as a bridgehead.
					
					 The U.S. arms buildup and largest-ever war maneuvers on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia are bound to spark a new arms race and Cold War in the region.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers will have to pay a high price for staging extremely dangerous war maneuvers, challenging all peace initiatives and proposals reflecting the good faith and magnanimity of the DPRK.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK Supreme Court Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Supreme Court Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Supreme Court led by President Pak Myong Chol left here Tuesday to visit Russia.

articles.title: British Guests Leave
articles.content:
British Guests Leave
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Glyn Ford, member of the National Policy Forum of the British Labor Party, and his party left here for home Tuesday.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Achievements of Young Scientists and Technicians Closes
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Achievements of Young Scientists and Technicians Closes
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The national exhibition of achievements of young scientists and technicians closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House Tuesday. It opened on Aug. 19 in celebration of the Youth Day. 
					 Displayed there were more than 3 600 valuable inventions and new technical proposals including over 750 IT products.
					
					 During the exhibition the participants introduced their scientific and technical achievements and exchanged experience gained in the efforts to apply them into production. 
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, officials concerned, officials of the youth league, young scientists and technicians, working youth and three revolution team members. 
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, made a closing address. 
					
					 The speaker said that the organizations of the youth league and young people should successfully carry out the honorable mission and duty of the youth vanguard of Songun in dynamically conducting the campaign of brains and technology under the uplifted slogan of "Let us make a shortcut to the final victory through the drive for breaking through the cutting edge!"
					
					 Results of the exhibition were announced by the jury. 
					
					 Citations and certificates were awarded to units and participants who were highly estimated at the exhibition.

articles.title: DPRK Wins Second Gold at Youth Olympiad
articles.content:
DPRK Wins Second Gold at Youth Olympiad
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Ri Se Ung of the DPRK bagged a gold medal in the men's 42kg category Greco-Roman wrestling of the Second Youth Olympic Games.
					 He beat his Tajik and Mexican rivals by 4:0 respectively in the preliminaries and Turkish rival by 3:1 in the finals.
					
					 This is the second gold medal for the DPRK at the games. The first gold was taken by Pak Jong Ju, a weightlifter, in the men's 62kg category.
					
					 Ri, a wrestler of the DPRK's Chobyong Sports Team, had already proved successful at the Asian Junior Wrestling Championships held last year and this year.

articles.title: Enthusiasm for Sports Runs High in DPRK
articles.content:
Enthusiasm for Sports Runs High in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- August and September are the months for the people's physical strength examination in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 With the months as an occasion, efforts are concentrated on whipping up the atmosphere for sports across the country and inspiring all the people to take part in mass sports activities.
					
					 Every year all the sectors and units, including ministries and national institutions, have paid deep attention to the physical training of their employees so that they can pass through the examination in sports events and standards set by the state.
					
					 Also, a campaign has been conducted to provide enough sports facilities and raise the people's interest in sports. 
					
					 Enthusiasm for sports activities is now running high at industrial establishments and schools and in co-op farms and other fields, through the preparations for the people's physical strength examination.

articles.title: New Diagnostic Technique for Engine Developed
articles.content:
New Diagnostic Technique for Engine Developed
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- University of Sciences in the DPRK developed a new technology of swiftly checking up the performance of internal combustion engines for vehicles.
					 This technology helps correctly grasp the features and moment of engine's rotation and its power in no-load condition. It also makes it possible to find out in time the abnormal state of the fuel supply system.
					
					 The new technology, which needs neither special equipment nor measuring means, has been already introduced to practice, proving its economic value.

articles.title: Japan's Indelible Crime -- Ukishima-maru Incident
articles.content:
Japan's Indelible Crime -- Ukishima-maru Incident
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Japan committed many murderous crimes against the Korean nation.
					 Among them is Ukishima-maru incident, in which the Japanese imperialists intentionally blew up the ship Ukishima on August 24, 1945 to kill thousands of innocent Koreans.
					
					 Right after the liberation of Korea from Japan's colonial rule, many Koreans gathered at a port in Aomori Prefecture of Japan to return home. As for them, they were taken to Japan for slave labor at coal mines and other construction sites.
					
					 On August 22, 1945, the Japanese navy SPs incited those Koreans to get aboard the Ukishima-maru, a transport ship of the Japanese navy, saying that the ship was tasked to bring them back to Pusan Port of Korea.
					
					But, that night the ship sailed southward along the coastline of Japan, not toward Pusan.
					
					 On August 24, it was broken into two pieces and sunk by explosion in the sea off Maizuru Port, Kyoto Prefecture. And the Japanese imperialists claimed that the ship was sunk by a mine.
					
					 However, the ship's sinking was not an accident but a crime intentionally committed by Japan, as proven by the facts that the passengers were forced to get on the ship, the ship started its voyage with lack of fuel and the Japanese seamen and SPs run away on lifeboats from the ship just before its explosion.
					
					 The whole course of the incident and testimonies made by survivors clearly show that the Ukishima-maru incident was a deliberate massacre committed under the Japanese government's plan to slay Koreans.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Political Camp Urged to Opt for Instituting Special Law
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Political Camp Urged to Opt for Instituting Special Law 
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, on August 21 in an editorial demanded the puppet political camp opt for instituting a special law on probing the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 The editorial recalled that the bereaved families objected two times to the agreement made by the ruling and opposition parties on the special law for probing the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 Noting that the reason is clear, the editorial disclosed that the political camp produced a draft agreement at negotiations held behind closed doors without a prior consultation with the bereaved families and put pressure on them to accept it. 
					
					 Now is the time for the "president" to give an answer, it noted.
					
					 It urged the chief executive to show her sincerity if the promise made by her in her talk to the people is not a lie.
					
					 The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on August 20 carried a similar editorial.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" let loose a spate of remarks that "there is no renegotiation ", "there is no proposal to fully meet the demand of the bereaved families" and "how can victims investigate assailants" only to spark off mistrust of the bereaved families, it said.
					
					 What is the most important and indispensable element is to have the demands of the bereaved families reflected in the institution of the special law on the ferry Sewol, it noted.

articles.title: Lawmaker from Opposition Party in S. Korea Discloses Military's Attempt to Conceal Truth about Violence
articles.content:
Lawmaker from Opposition Party in S. Korea Discloses Military's Attempt to Conceal Truth about Violence
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The disclosure of the puppet military authorities' attempt to conceal the truth about the cases of violence is touching off resentment among people from all walks of life in south Korea.
					 This was disclosed by a lawmaker from an opposition party on Aug. 19.
					
					 According to him, there were over 150 remains and dead bodies in the army till May 30.
					
					 They met suspicious deaths, unable to endure the dreadful military service. But those were not sent to their parents as yet.
					
					 18 of them are kept in cold storages as their parents refused to take over them and send them to crematories till the truth about their deaths is probed, because they declared they could not agree with the military authorities' confirmation of their deaths as suicides. The rest of the remains were those of the soldiers whose families refused to take over them, infuriated by their refusal to keep their promises that they would treat them as the service members who died while in service after their bodies are cremated.
					
					 This clearly shows how desperately the present ruling forces of south Korea are working to reduce the puppet army to a colonial mercenary army of the U.S. imperialists and a means for confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north by fostering violence in its units.

articles.title: UFG under Fire in Japan
articles.content:
UFG under Fire in Japan 
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement on August 21 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers for kicking off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises for aggression.
					 UFG to which the "tailored deterrence strategy" will be formally applied is dangerous saber-rattling aimed to make a preemptive nuclear strike on the DPRK, the statement said, strongly demanding the U.S. stop it at once.
					
					 It urged the south Korean authorities to take practical steps for improving the north-south relations, instead of working hard to ignite a war for stifling the DPRK in league with the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is getting frantic in its moves to reinforce its  missile defense system and bolster up its forces in a bid to expand the sphere of influence in the Asia-Pacific region under the pretext of the non-existent "nuclear and missile threats" from the DPRK, it said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. is going to stir up military confrontation among big powers and escalate tensions in the Asia-Pacific region and deprive Asian peoples including those of Korea and Japan of their peaceful life.
					
					 The U.S. should stop at once its military exercises and moves for building a missile defense system and pull out of south Korea.
					
					 Now is the time for the U.S. to opt for sincere dialogue with the DPRK to conclude a peace agreement.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico 
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Juche-Oriented Socialist State with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico on August 19. 
					 The work, published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008), clarifies in detail that the invincible might of the DPRK lies in preserving and glorifying forever the Juche-oriented idea of President Kim Il Sung on building the state and his exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Disseminated in Romania, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Disseminated in Romania, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A seminar and reading session on supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" were held by the Romanian Socialist Choice Party and the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics on Aug. 20. 
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Romanian party, explained the main contents of the work, and said:
					
					 H.E. Kim Jong Un made public this famous work on the 53rd anniversary of the start of the Songun revolutionary leadership by H.E. Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 As he clarified, H.E. Kim Jong Il's history of the Songun revolutionary leadership is an unprecedented history of independence against imperialism and great patriotic devotion and a history of profound trust and love characterized by absolute trust in the service personnel and people and fatherly love for them. 
					
					 H.E. Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun revolutionary idea and developed it in depth, providing guidelines, ever-victorious banner to be held aloft not only by the Korean people but also by  the world revolutionary people in accomplishing the human cause of independence. 
					
					 The work of H.E. Kim Jong Un is an important document as it declared before the whole world the succession to the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun started and developed by President Kim Il Sung and H.E. Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Songun Marked in Nigeria, Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Songun Marked in Nigeria, Guinea 
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A Korean book exhibition and film show took place at the Ministry of Labor in Yobe State, Nigeria and film shows at the Abuja housing construction company of Nigeria and Almami Samori Toure Barracks of the Guinean Army on Aug. 20 on the occasion of the Day of Songun. 
					 Displayed there were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing Songun Korea. 
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Korean People's Army, Steel-Strong Ranks" and "Arms of Korea". 
					
					 A department director of the Ministry of Labor in Yobe State, Nigeria and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il put the national power of the DPRK on the highest stage with his Songun revolutionary leadership, praising the undying Songun revolutionary leadership feats performed by Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The manager of the Abuja housing construction company said Kim Il Sung achieved the brilliant victory in the wars against U.S. and Japanese imperialism and Kim Jong Il won one victory after another in the standoff with the U.S. 
					
					 The commander of the First Commando of Almami Samori Toure Barracks of the Guinean Army said that thanks to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il the military power of the DPRK was bolstered up in every way and the DPRK could lay a springboard from which to build a thriving socialist nation despite the worst ordeals and adversities.

articles.title: Day of Songun Observed in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Day of Songun Observed in Kyrgyzstan  
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party, released a statement on Aug. 20 on the occasion of the Day of Songun. 
					 He said:
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership on August 25, 1960, true to the intention of Comrade Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il put forward the Korean People's Army as the main force for the socialist cause and saw to it that the whole society learned from the revolutionary soldier spirit created in the army. 
					
					 He also laid down the line of economic construction in the era of Songun for simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture while preferentially developing defence industry, thus providing a sure guarantee for developing the national economy despite the ever-more undisguised moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 Thanks to his Songun leadership the Korean People's Army grew to be a matchless army equipped with modern offensive and defensive means and the DPRK turned into a nuclear weapons state and satellite producer and launcher. 
					
					 Under the wise leadership of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un the army and people of the DPRK will win only victory under the uplifted great banner of Songun in the future, too.

articles.title: DPRK's Principled Stand Reported by Foreign Countries, Regional Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Principled Stand Reported by Foreign Countries, Regional Organization
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The statement issued by a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army and the statement released by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry were reported by foreign countries and a regional organization between August 18 and 21. The statements denounced the U.S. and south Korean belligerent forces for kicking off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises for aggression.
					 Telesur TV of Venezuela reported a program illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un:
					
					 The DPRK warned that all the bases of aggression of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces are within the striking range of the former's strategic and tactical rockets.
					
					 Massive demos are taking place in south Korea demanding a stop to UFG.
					
					 Peace and stability are being disturbed and international law ignored wherever the U.S. is setting foot in.
					
					 The full texts or gists of the above-said statements were posted on websites of the Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, the Crimean Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Kirov Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Group for Solidarity with the DPRK, internet magazines Mar 12 and Hanber Journal, the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, and were reported by SANA of Syria, the Nepalese paper Nepal Today, the Kuwaiti paper Kuwait Times, the Angolan paper Jornal de Angola, the Peruvian paper Peru 21 and the Uruguayan paper La Juventud.

articles.title: UFG Condemned by Beninese Organizations
articles.content:
UFG Condemned by Beninese Organizations
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Cotonou, Benin on August 20 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers for kicking off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises for aggression.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said in a speech:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities are kicking off UFG despite the unanimous protest and denunciation of the world peace-loving people.
					
					 UFG is dangerous nuclear war drills aimed to make a surprise preemptive strike on the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is describing UFG as "annual and defensive one" to conceal its aggressive nature and danger but it is the self-evident fact that this is an unpardonable criminal act of disturbing the peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said:
					
					 The U.S. has already rounded off the plans for a war of aggression against the DPRK and is ceaselessly kicking off war maneuvers in various names every year.
					
					 The U.S., stop UFG at once.

articles.title: MINREX califica a EE.UU. de pais violador de DDHH
articles.content:
MINREX califica a EE.UU. de pais violador de DDHH 
 Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que se internacionaliza la discriminacion racial en Estados Unidos, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 26 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC: 
					 Hace poco, en la ciudad de Ferguson de estado de Missouri, EE.UU., un muchacho negro fue fusilado por un policia blanco. Y los policias reprimieron indiscriminadamente con fusiles y bombas lacrimogenas y fumigenas a los manifestantes de protesta. En tanto, en otra ciudad tambien un adolescente negro fue matado a tiros por la policia. 
					
					 En EE.UU., pais violador de DDHH, las razas de color se ven discriminadas y despreciadas y los habitantes tiemblan de miedo por no saber cuando sufririan el fusilazo. 
					
					 Las manifestaciones de protesta desarrolladas en toda la extension estadounidense incluso la ciudad de Ferguson son la explosion de descontento arraigado de los habitantes por la discriminacion racial y la desigualdad reinantes en la sociedad estadounidense.
					
					 Por el presente caso se ha revelado plenamente la situacion corrupta de DDHH de la sociedad estadounidense y evidenciado la necesidad de sentar al imperio en el banquillo de acusado de DDHH. 
					
					 EE.UU. critica cada ano la "situacion de DDHH" de otros paises como si fuera "juez internacional de DDHH", pero, ahora sufre una verguenza por el caso ocurrido en su propio pais. 
					
					 Lo que debe hacer el imperio es aceptar con sinceridad la unanime critica de la comunidad internacional y apagar primero el incendio de su casa, antes de "preocuparse" por los asuntos ajenos e intervenir en ellos. 
					
					 EE.UU. no debe buscar la solucion en la represion a los manifestantes, sino revelar el verdadero aspecto de su sociedad, infierno de DDHH y comprender bien cuales son verdaderos derechos humanos y cual es el verdadero aseguramiento de DDHH. 
					
					 El imperio norteamericano. debe tener presente que es inevitable la desgracia si actua con imprudencia.

articles.title: ACNC acusa a EE.UU. de autor de fabricacion y circulacion de billetes falsificados
articles.content:
ACNC acusa a EE.UU. de autor de fabricacion y circulacion de billetes falsificados
 Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ACNC) -- Hace poco, en Estados Unidos se ha descubierto el crimen de falsificacion de billetes sin precedentes. 
					 El pasado dia 14, The Cherry Hill County Post y otros periodicos estadounidenses reportaron que en mayo de este ano las autoridades de Investigacion arrestaron a 10 estadounidenses y 3 israelies quienes desde la decada de 1990 vinieron fabricando y circulando los billetes falsificados de 100 US$ y alcanza a mas de 77 millones de US$ la moneda fabricada por los delincuentes. 
					
					 Y revelaron que solo el ano pasado se descubrieron en EE.UU. los billetes falsificados valorados en 156 millones de US$, 262 centros de acunacion y  2 mil 668 delincuentes. 
					
					 La realidad demuestra que EE.UU. es el origen de fabricacion de moneda falsificada y autor de su circulacion. 
					
					 La CIA y otros organos gubernamentales comenten al frente ese crimen. 
					
					 Hace unos anos, el rotativo aleman Frankfurlter Allgemeine habia revelado, a base del resultado de investigacion de varios anos realizada por los especialistas europeos y asiaticos y el testigo de los hombres relacionados con la impresion, que la CIA acunaba los dineros falsificados en una imprenta oculta en el suburbio de Washington. 
					
					 La sociedad internacional insiste unanimemente en que la administracion norteamericana fabrica billetes falsificados con el fin de invertir enormes fondos en las operaciones secretas para exterminar la libertad y la democracia. 
					
					 El autor de fabricacion y circulacion de monedas falsificadas es la administracion norteamericana. 
					
					 Sin embargo, EE.UU. acusa a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de "pais fabricante de billetes falsificados". 
					
					 Para atribuir la credibilidad al "rumor de falsificacion monetaria" dice que los "fugitivos norcoreanos" "testimoniaron" que la RPDC fabrica la moneda norteamericana importando los equipos, el papel y la tinta de otros paises y que se puede seleccionar los "superbilletes" fabricados por la RPDC solo con la maquina ultramoderna. E insiste en la necesidad de trasladar a su pais a los delincuentes y equipos. 
					
					 Pero, EE.UU. no confirma todavia su insistencia ridicula. Al contrario, en el interior de ese imperio se alzan cada dia mas las voces de sospechas y rechazo. 
					
					 El ex embajador norteamericano ante la ONU, Bolton y otros funcionarios intransigentes del mismo pais dijeron que "no hay testigos evidentes de que el Norte de Corea fabrica monedas falsificadas". 
					
					 Hasta los periodicos norteamericanos revelaron que el numero 100 en los "superbilletes de fabricacion norcoreana" es escrito con la tinta especial que se suministra solo al Buro de Acunacion de EE.UU. bajo el control riguroso y que los "testigos" son todos increibles "fugitivos norcoreanos" y fraudulentos que quieren ganar mucho dinero y no vieron ninguna vez el proceso de fabricacion de "dolares falsificados".
					
					 Las autoridades de Investigacion de EE.UU. tambien realizaron la investigacion cerca de un ano, pero reconocieron que es incierto el "rumor de falsificacion de moneda" de la RPDC. 
					
					 Tales hechos evidencian que fue una intriga el "rumor de falsificacion de moneda" de la RPDC.
					
					 La falsificacion de moneda y el contrabando de drogas son vicios de EE.UU. 
					
					 La sociedad internacional burla a EE.UU. que recurre a las maniobras dominacionistas inventando las farsas como "rumores de billetes falsificados y contrabando de drogas".

articles.title: Militares juran glorificar hazanas de Songun de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Militares juran glorificar hazanas de Songun de Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 25 en el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de la comuna Ssang-un el acto de juramento de los oficiales y los soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea de glorificar las hazanas del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il realizadas en su direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun y apoyar con fidelidad la direccion del Comandante Supremo del EPC Kim Jong Un.
					 A la ocasion asistieron los comandantes, oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC.
					
					 Antes del acto, hubo la ceremonia general y el concierto de las bandas militares de las unidades del EPC.
					
					 El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC, Hyon Yong Chol, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					
					 El informante dijo que el Dia del Songun, fiesta revolucionaria que se puede llamar con el nombre del Dirigente, es un dia historico a ser registrado en la historia de la construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea y los anales de la patria junto con el dia de la fundacion del ejercito.
					
					 El 25 de agosto del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente dejo su primera huella de direccion del Songun en la  Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su, asi que se hereda invariablemente la noble historia y la tradicion de la revolucion coreana, iniciada y avanzada victoriosamente con el fusil y se abre una nueva era de la revolucion juechana que sale siempre victoriosa bajo la bandera del Songun.
					
					 Desde el primer periodo de su direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, el Dirigente presento la idea de dar prioridad a los asuntos militares, presto la fuerza primordial al aumento de la capacidad militar, fortalecio por todos los medios el poderio politico-militar del EPC y defendio con firmeza el socialismo a estilo coreano frustrando las tentativas provocadoras de los enemigos, subrayo.
					
					 Elogio que la RPDC ha llevado adelante por el unico camino victorioso la revolucion y la construccion frustrando la arbitrariedad y coaccion de los imperialistas, lo cual es un milagro de la historia que solo puede realizar el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Las hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente quien durante mas de 50 anos desde aquel dia en que el dejo en la comuna de Ssang-un sus primeras huellas de direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, levanto en alto y defendio confiablemente la dignidad y el prestigio de la patria, brillaran eternamente con la prosperidad de la potencia de Paektu.
					
					 Hoy, las hazanas revolucionarias del Songun se llevan adelante gracias a la destacada direccion del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Ahora se abre la epoca dorada del desarrollo de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y la prosperidad de la patria gracias al Comandante Supremo quien inspecciona sin cesar las unidades del EPC, donde estan conservadas las huellas de orientacion del Dirigente, y los puestos militares de linea avanzada y llama a todos los militares y civiles a la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					 Todos deben unirse en torno al Mariscal y glorificar las hazanas de la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun y luchar energicamente para lograr la reunificacion de la patria y la victoria final de la construccion de la potencia prospera.
					
					 Seguidamente, intervinieron el general del EPC Kim Song Chol y los oficiales Choe Chol Ju, Pak Kwang Chol y Sonu Yong Saeng.
					
					 Terminado el acto, los oficiales y soldados del EPC bailaron al compas de las canciones militares, recorrieron el lugar historico y tuvieron un encuentro de explicacion sobre la noble personalidad del Dirigente.
